Utils¶

Contains general methods used by the application

utils.fast_response(freq, arm_length=2500000000.0, tdi2=False)¶

Sky averaged response of the LISA constellation for TDI X.

Parameters:

  • freq (array) – frequency range

  • arm_length (float) – arm length in meter

  • tdi2 (bool) – TDI1.5 or 2nd generation

Return array R:

LISA TDI X response

utils.psd2sh(freq, sx, arm_length=2500000000.0, tdi2=False, sky_averaging=False)¶

Return sensitivity curve from noise psd.

Parameters:

  • freq (array) – frequency range

  • SX (array) – noise PSD

  • tdi2 (bool) – TDI1.5 or 2nd generation

  • arm_length (float) – arm length in meter

  • sky_averaging (bool) – apply sky averaging factor

Return array Sh:

sensitivity

utils.compute_snr(xyz_, sxx_, sxy_)¶

SNR from TDI xyz_

Parameters:

  • xyz (3xN array) – signal TDI X,Y,Z

  • sxx (1xN array) – noise PSD auto term

  • sxy (1xN array) – noise PSD cross term

Return float snr:

total snr from X,Y,Z combination.

FOM application
